devdoc.author: BuidlGuidl
devdoc.details: A gasless polling system using EIP-712 signatures for off-chain voting

createPoll(string,uint256).details: Creates a new poll with configurable duration

params._duration: Duration in seconds (must be between MIN and MAX)

getActivePollCount().details: Gets the number of active polls

getAllPolls().details: Gets all polls (view function for frontend)

getDomainSeparator().details: Gets the domain separator for EIP-712

getPollExpiryTime(uint256).details: Gets the expiry timestamp of a poll

getPollsByCreator(address).details: Gets all polls created by a specific address

getTimeUntilExpiry(uint256).details: Gets remaining time until poll expires (in seconds)

returns.remainingTime: Time in seconds (0 if poll has expired)

getVoteHash(uint256,bool,uint256).details: Constructs the hash that users need to sign for voting

params._vote: The vote (true for yes, false for no)

hasUserVoted(uint256,address).details: Checks if user has voted on a poll

isPollActive(uint256).details: Checks if a poll is still active based on time

returns._0: bool True if poll is still active

recoverSigner(uint256,bool,uint256,bytes.details: Recovers the signer address from a signature

submitVotes(uint256[],bool[],uint256[],b.details: Submits a batch of votes (only callable by owner/relayer)

params._votes: Array of votes (true for yes, false for no)

devdoc.title: GaslessPoll
